products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout White Roller Blind
products.description: Their sahara pvc blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. This hard-wearing white pvc roller blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardent and waterproof, perfect for kitchens or bathrooms.
